notes.title: **Operation: Break The Law Phase 1**
points: - The Resistance Outpost's construction is complete! Stop by the end of Polar Place right outside Lawbot HQ to check it out!
- Toons can earn Dockets to use for exclusive Break the Law cosmetics!
- - Dockets are earned from defeating Lawbots. Lawbots defeated in DA Offices and the Chief Justice Battle have a 50% boost though!
- Lawbot HQ has had a 'makeover' by the Resistance.
- - A Gag Kiosk has been setup so toons can restock and get back in the fight quicker!
- Count Erclaim has made a return... But in Lawbot HQ?
- DA Office D's have been secured by the Toon Resistance! The Cog levels have been significantly reduced in DA office D's.

notes.title: **Misc**
points: - The level 20 department reward (merit carryover) has been nerfed to 50% instead of the full promotion.
- Fixed the infamous 'Defeat a Five++ Story Cog Building' Task poster issue.
